00037 #include "egs_rectangle.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_RectangularRing::EGS_RectangularRing(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax,
00042         EGS_Float ymin, EGS_Float ymax, EGS_Float xmin_i, EGS_Float xmax_i,
00043         EGS_Float ymin_i, EGS_Float ymax_i, const string &Name,
00044         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f), valid(true) {
00045     EGS_Float tmp;
00046     if (xmin > xmax) {
00047         tmp = xmax;
00048         xmax = xmin;
00049         xmin = tmp;
00050     }
00051     if (ymin > ymax) {
00052         tmp = ymax;
00053         ymax = ymin;
00054         ymin = tmp;
00055     }
00056     if (xmin_i > xmax_i) {
00057         tmp = xmax_i;
00058         xmax_i = xmin_i;
00059         xmin_i = tmp;
00060     }
00061     if (ymin_i > ymax_i) {
00062         tmp = ymax_i;
00063         ymax_i = ymin_i;
00064         ymin_i = tmp;
00065     }
00066     if (xmin_i < xmin || ymin_i < ymin || xmax_i > xmax || ymax_i > ymax) {
00067         valid = false;
00068         return;
00069     }
00070     r[0] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmin,xmin_i,ymin,ymax);
00071     r[1] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmax_i,xmax,ymin,ymax);
00072     r[2] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmin_i,xmax_i,ymin,ymin_i);
00073     r[3] = new EGS_RectangleShape(xmin_i,xmax_i,ymax_i,ymax);
00074     p[0] = (xmin_i - xmin)*(ymax - ymin);
00075     p[1] = (xmax - xmax_i)*(ymax - ymin);
00076     p[2] = (xmax_i - xmin_i)*(ymin_i - ymin);
00077     p[3] = (xmax_i - xmin_i)*(ymax - ymax_i);
00078     A = p[0] + p[1] + p[2] + p[3];
00079     p[0] /= A;
00080     p[1] = p[1]/A + p[0];
00081     p[2] = p[2]/A + p[1];
00082     p[3] = 1.1;
00083 
00084     otype = "rectangular ring";
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 EGS_RectangularRing::~EGS_RectangularRing() {
00089     if (valid) {
00090         delete r[0];
00091         delete r[1];
00092         delete r[2];
00093         delete r[3];
00094     };
00095 }

00097 
00098 extern "C" {
00099 
00100     EGS_RECTANGLE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape *createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00101             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00102         if (!input) {
00103             egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): null input?\n");
00104             return 0;
00105         }
00106         vector<EGS_Float> pos;
00107         int err = input->getInput("rectangle",pos);
00108         if (err) {
00109             egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): no 'rectangle' input\n");
00110             return 0;
00111         }
00112         if (pos.size() != 4) {
00113             egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): found only %d inputs instead"
00114                        " of 4\n");
00115             return 0;
00116         }
00117         EGS_BaseShape *shape;
00118         vector<EGS_Float> posi;
00119         err = input->getInput("inner rectangle",posi);
00120         if (!err && posi.size() == 4) {
00121             EGS_RectangularRing *s = new EGS_RectangularRing(pos[0],pos[2],pos[1],
00122                     pos[3],posi[0],posi[2],posi[1],posi[3],"",f);
00123             if (!s->isValid()) {
00124                 egsWarning("createShape(rectangle): your input did not result in"
00125                            " a valid \"rectangular ring\"\n");
00126                 delete s;
00127             }
00128             else {
00129                 shape = s;
00130             }
00131         }
00132         else {
00133             shape = new EGS_RectangleShape(pos[0],pos[2],pos[1],pos[3],"",f);
00134         }
00135         if (shape) {
00136             shape->setName(input);
00137             shape->setTransformation(input);
00138         }
00139         return shape;
00140     }
00141 
00142 }
